Actions.name: SendMessageToGroup
Actions.display: Send to all Clients with the Servergroup <1> a private Message <2>

Actions.name: SendMessageToAll
Actions.display: Send a private Message <1> to all Clients on the Server

Actions.name: AddServerGroup
Actions.display: Add the Client <1> to the Servergroup <2>

Actions.name: RemoveServerGroup
Actions.display: Remove the Client <1> from the Servergroup <2>

Actions.name: MoveClientToChannel
Actions.display: Move the Client <1> to the Channel <2>

Actions.name: KickClientFromChannel
Actions.display: Move the Client <1> to the Default Channel

Actions.name: KickClientFromServer
Actions.display: Kick the Client <1> from the Server

Actions.name: BanClient
Actions.display: Ban the Client <1> with the Reason <2> for <3> Seconds from the Server
